lead_paragraph: Mark Behan, working on behalf of NYCO Minerals, thanked a number of staffers at the Department of Environmental Conservation for their help in getting the Adirondack Council to change its position on the amendment.

headline.main: A Thank You Email for Helping With the Amendment

snippet: Mark Behan, working on behalf of NYCO Minerals, thanked a number of staffers at the Department of Environmental Conservation for their help in getting the Adirondack Council to change its position on the amendment.
